reviewText:
"that the Church has no authority whatsoever to confer priestly ordination on women" (Ordinatio Sacerdotalis, Pope John Paul II)

St. Paul explicitly forbids women to attempt to exercise such functions.

"Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection. But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to use authority over the man: but to be in silence." (Timothy 2:11-12)

"Let women keep silence in the churches: for it is not permitted them to speak but to be subject, as also the law saith." (1Cor. 14:34)
It was excellent .I learned so much that I didn' tknow about the early days of the church.
This is a great movie about the plight of women priest's and the history behind the movement; a must see film.
Really well done documentary on women priests in the Catholic Church. Informative and interesting -- both background and interviews that kept my attention on this vital topic.
Documentary about women who have been ordaind "contra legem" to roman catholic woman priest. Catholic woman shold see this. Catholic men too.
